thread.section_title: Taylor Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Well located, confortable, great service
thread.title_full: Well located, confortable, great service - Review of Taylor Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Mark02015
title: Well located, confortable, great service
text: I really enjoyed my stay. The location was so convenient, near Place de la Republique, Porte Saint Martin and a short walk away from Pompidou and major tourist attractions. The space is clean and confortable. The highlight was the excellent service, extremely nice staff and always very helpful!
